EmailTemplate.description: Advise customer we have no current price/LT and request will take 3-6 weeks for quote
EmailTemplate.name: No Current Price
EmailTemplate.subject: GSS Does Not Have Current Price
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Ground Support Solutions. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Ground Support Solutions does not have current price and lead time for the requested part number. Please allow 3-6 weeks to provide the quotation.
We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we process your request.
Best Regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Ground Support Solutions
